Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.hem2020e3.equipments.boiler.sil

Boiler SIL simulation for the Household Energy Management example.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Activate
    The class Activate represents the action of activating the boiler as an event in the SIL simulation (after a priorly passivating it).
    BoilerElectricalSILModel
    The class BoilerElectricalSILModel defines a SIL simulation model for the electricity consumption of a boiler.
    BoilerWaterSILModel
    The class BoilerElectricitySILModel defines a simple SIL simulation model for a water boiler.
    DoNotHeat
    The class DoNotHeat represents the action of putting off the heating of the boiler as an event in the SIL simulation.
    Heat
    The class Heat represents the action of putting on the heating of the boiler as an event in the SIL simulation.
    Passivate
    The class Passivate represents the action of passivating the boiler as an event in the SIL simulation (when it is active).

Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.hem2020e3.equipments.boiler.sil Description

Boiler SIL simulation for the Household Energy Management example.

The fact that you are presently reading this means that you have had knowledge of the CeCILL-C license and that you accept its terms.

This package defines the elements required to simulate a boiler in the Household Energy Management example in a SIL simulation mode. See the parent package for more information about the simulation models.
